azure_blob_storage_endpoint_domain_name.description: This is Azure Blob Storage endpoint domain name. Leave default value (or leave it empty if run container from command line) to use Microsoft native from example.
azure_blob_storage_endpoint_domain_name.title: Azure Blob Storage Endpoint Domain Name

azure_blob_storage_account_name.description: The name of the Azure Blob Storage Account. Read more here.
azure_blob_storage_account_name.title: Azure Blob Storage Account Name

azure_blob_storage_container_name.description: The name of the Azure Blob Storage Container. Read more here.
azure_blob_storage_container_name.title: Azure Blob Storage Container Name

shared_access_signature.description: A shared access signature (SAS) provides secure delegated access to resources in your storage account. Read more here. If you set this value, you must not set the account key.
shared_access_signature.title: Shared Access Signature

azure_blob_storage_account_key.description: The Azure blob storage account key. If you set this value, you must not set the Shared Access Signature.
azure_blob_storage_account_key.title: Azure Blob Storage account key

azure_blob_storage_spill_size.description: The amount of megabytes after which the connector should spill the records in a new blob object. Make sure to configure size greater than individual records. Enter 0 if not applicable.
azure_blob_storage_spill_size.title: Azure Blob Storage target blob size (Megabytes)
